data.lyric:
[ti:Dreams Money Can Buy (Explicit)]
[ar:Drake]
[al:Care Package (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Dreams Money Can Buy (Explicit) - Drake
[00:05.78]Lyrics by：Aubrey Graham
[00:11.57]Composed by：Aubrey Graham
[00:17.36]Don't f**k with me don't f**k with me
[00:22.59]Don't f**k with me don't f**k with me
[00:27.93]Don't f**k with me don't f**k with me
[00:31.78]Don't
[00:32.52]I got car money fresh start money
[00:35.11]I want Saudi money I want art money
[00:37.72]I want women to cry and pour out they heart for me
[00:40.30]And tell me how much they hate it when they apart from me
[00:43.15]Yeah and lately I do b***hes the meanest
[00:45.60]Tell 'em I love 'em and don't ever mean it
[00:47.60]We go on dates I send the Maybach out in neighborhoods
[00:50.02]They never seen it
[00:51.12]That s**t is dangerous but it's so convenient I ain't lying
[00:53.72]Yeah and comfortable I sit
[00:56.01]That manual Ferrari Italia some fly s**t
[00:58.82]It's sitting at the house like I bought it in '96
[01:01.35]'Cause honestly I'm too f**king busy to drive stick
[01:03.81]I swear too f**king busy too busy f**kin'
[01:07.15]This n***a girl but to me she wasn't
[01:08.69]Been hot before they open doors for me pre-heated oven
[01:11.19]I'm in this ho but I ain't finished though
[01:13.68]It's been a minute though
[01:14.96]My newest girl from back home got issues with parents
[01:17.76]And some charges how the f**k can I get her to Paris
[01:20.64]Luckily I'm the greatest my country's ever seen
[01:23.02]So chances are I get the border to issue me clearance
[01:26.48]Dreams money can buy
[01:27.98]Everybody yelled surprise I wasn't surprised
[01:31.33]That's only 'cause I been waiting on it n***a
[01:33.45]So f**k whoever hating on a n***a of course
[01:36.21]Don't f**k with me don't f**k with me
[01:40.59]Don't
[01:41.25]Don't f**k with me don't f**k with me
[01:45.92]Don't
[01:46.44]Don't f**k with me don't f**k with me
[01:51.24]Don't
[01:51.86]Don't f**k with me don't f**k with me
[01:56.54]Don't
[01:57.68]Food from India she in Charlotte Olympias
[02:00.40]We talked music for hours she never mentioned ya
[02:03.15]Can't tell you how much I love when n***as think they got it
[02:05.85]And I love the fact that line made 'em think about it
[02:08.61]YMCMB
[02:10.20]These n***as make it so hard to be friendly
[02:11.83]When I know part of it's envy
[02:13.58]Tryna fill the shoes n***a so far these are empty
[02:15.83]I take 'em off in the house because the throw carpets are Fendi
[02:19.19]Ooh I never seen the car you claim to drive
[02:21.76]Well s**t I seen it you just ain't inside
[02:23.80]And I feel like lately it went from top five to remaining five
[02:27.12]My favorite rappers either lost it or they ain't alive
[02:29.94]And they tryna bring us down me Weezy and Stunna
[02:32.45]We stayed up Christmas lights in the middle of summer
[02:35.02]And if the girl standing next to me got a fat a*s
[02:38.64]Then I'll probably give her my number
[02:40.50]Yeah I throw my dollars up high
[02:43.74]And they land on the stage you dance on
[02:46.33]We got company coming over
[02:49.01]Would it kill you to put some pants on
[02:51.67]Dreams money can buy
[02:53.25]They told me it's like a high and it wasn't a lie yeah
[02:56.27]Just have some good p***y waiting on a n***a
[02:58.64]And f**k whoever hating on a n***a
[03:01.12]Aw yeah
[03:01.43]Don't f**k with me don't f**k with me
[03:05.87]Don't
[03:06.55]Don't f**k with me don't f**k with me
[03:11.21]Don't
[03:11.86]Don't f**k with me don't f**k with me
[03:16.54]Don't
[03:17.18]Don't f**k with me don't f**k with me
[03:21.88]Don't
[03:24.60]Don't
[03:27.95]Don't f**k with me don't f**k with me
[03:43.82]Don't
data.trans:
[ti:Dreams Money Can Buy (Explicit)]
[ar:Drake]
[al:Care Package (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:05.78]//
[00:11.57]//
[00:17.36]不要跟我混 不要跟我玩
[00:22.59]不要跟我混 不要跟我玩
[00:27.93]不要跟我混 不要跟我玩
[00:31.78]不要
[00:32.52]我有钱买车 我可以用钱开始新生活
[00:35.11]我想像沙特王室一样富有 我想要钱买艺术品
[00:37.72]我想要女人哭着对我敞开心扉
[00:40.30]对我说她们多不想和我分开
[00:43.15]最近我对女人极其刻薄
[00:45.60]嘴上说爱她们 心里却不这样想
[00:47.60]我们约会时 我派司机开迈巴赫去她小区接她
[00:50.02]她从未见过这种车
[00:51.12]这种东西很危险 但真的很方便 我没骗人
[00:53.72]我一身轻松地坐着
[00:56.01]手动挡的法拉利 真是有点酷炫
[00:58.82]它就停在房子边 仿佛是我九六年买回来的
[01:01.35]因为 坦白说 我太忙了 没空开手动挡的车
[01:03.81]我发誓 太忙了 忙得不可开交
[01:07.15]这个姑娘有点假小子 但对我来说还好
[01:08.69]她还没有开门 我就欲火难耐 也算是预热了一下
[01:11.19]我和她玩得正火热 我还没有完事呢
[01:13.68]已经有一段时间了
[01:14.96]我在家乡刚交的女友和她父母闹了矛盾
[01:17.76]还面临着指控 我该怎样把她带去巴黎
[01:20.64]幸运的是 我是我的祖国有史以来最伟大的人
[01:23.02]所以 说不定我能让他们给我开个出入境许可
[01:26.48]梦想可以用钱买
[01:27.98]大家都在说惊讶 我不觉得惊讶
[01:31.33]因为这就是我期待已久的时刻
[01:33.45]所以那些对我心怀怨恨的人 随他们去吧
[01:36.21]不要跟我混 不要跟我玩
[01:40.59]不要
[01:41.25]不要跟我混 不要跟我玩
[01:45.92]不要
[01:46.44]不要跟我混 不要跟我玩
[01:51.24]不要
[01:51.86]不要跟我混 不要跟我玩
[01:56.54]不要
[01:57.68]吃着印度菜 她穿着Charlotte Olympias的鞋
[02:00.40]我们聊了好几小时的音乐 她从没提起你
[02:03.15]每当我看到那些自以为是的人 我都忍俊不禁
[02:05.85]更有趣的是 他们是因为吸多了那玩意儿 才变成这样
[02:08.61]//
[02:10.20]这些家伙让我想要与他们和平相处都不行
[02:11.83]因为我知道他们其实心怀妒忌
[02:13.58]想要担起重任 目前为止 还没人有这种能力
[02:15.83]进屋之后我就要把鞋子脱掉 因为Fendi地毯很名贵
[02:19.19]你口口声声说你开着什么车 我却从没看到过
[02:21.76]好吧 我看见了 但你没有在车里
[02:23.80]最近 我感觉我心中最厉害的五个人变成了仅剩的五个人
[02:27.12]我最爱的说唱歌手要么就是没落了 要么已不在人世
[02:29.94]他们想要击垮我们 我 Lil Wayne 还有Birdman
[02:32.45]我们屹立不倒 盛夏时分 亮起圣诞灯光
[02:35.02]如果我身边的姑娘身材有料
[02:38.64]那我可能会给她我的电话号码
[02:40.50]我把我的钞票扔得高高的
[02:43.74]落在你跳舞的台子上
[02:46.33]我们有不速之客来了
[02:49.01]快穿上裤子 可以吧
[02:51.67]梦想可以用钱买
[02:53.25]他们说 这就像一场狂欢 这确实不假
[02:56.27]有个漂亮的姑娘在等着我呢
[02:58.64]仇恨我的那些家伙 随他们去吧
[03:01.12]//
[03:01.43]不要跟我混 不要跟我玩
[03:05.87]不要
[03:06.55]不要跟我混 不要跟我玩
[03:11.21]不要
[03:11.86]不要跟我混 不要跟我玩
[03:16.54]不要
[03:17.18]不要跟我混 不要跟我玩
[03:21.88]不要
[03:24.60]不要
[03:27.95]不要跟我混 不要跟我玩
[03:43.82]不要
